snippet: Aviva said it would sell or close more than a quarter of its businesses in a shake-up aimed at regaining the support of investors.
abstract: British insurer Aviva plans to sell or close 16 divisions, more than a quarter of its businesses, in a shake-up aimed at regaining the support of investors.
lead_paragraph: Aviva said it would sell or close more than a quarter of its businesses in a shake-up aimed at regaining the support of investors.

headline.main: Ailing British Insurer Planning to Drop 16 Lagging Divisions
headline.print_headline: Ailing British Insurer Planning To Drop 16 Lagging Divisions
